channel.title: CNN.com - Top Stories
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2016 Cable News Network LP, LLLP.

image.title: CNN.com - Top Stories
image.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

item.title: Firework cache explodes; dozens killed at Indian temple
Cruz camp points to Kasich 'double-cross'
item.description: Ted Cruz suffered a rare convention loss Saturday after delegates backing John Kasich and Donald Trump boxed him out of key positions in the Michigan delegation.

item.title: Trump: Cruz 'has hatred for New York'
Opinion: Time to tackle nuclear threat
Spieth leads Masters despite sorry finish
Designer Fabio Novembre reveals his most treasured objects
item.description: Fabio Novembre loves objects. "We are surrounded by things," he enthuses in his treasure-filled Milan studio. "They are like little spirits -- they aid souls."

item.title: Sanders' winning ways continue in Wyoming
Third Brussels airport suspect in custody
Trump weighs in on Dems' spat
item.description: Bernie Sanders caught heat this week for saying Hillary Clinton was unqualified for the presidency, but Donald Trump is siding with the Vermont senator.

item.title: Sanders to Clinton: 'Stop being vague'
item.description: Bernie Sanders was combative Saturday morning during a rally stop in Washington Heights in New York City, calling on Hillary Clinton to "stop being vague" about her plan to tax income and increase Social Security benefits.

item.title: Yemen: 28 soldiers killed ahead of truce
item.description: At least 28 Yemeni soldiers were killed, and others injured, after gunmen blocked a main road and opened fire on their vehicles in southern Yemen on Saturday, hours before a U.N.-brokered ceasefire was scheduled to take effect, local security officials told CNN.

item.title: Horrors of life as an ISIS human shield
Def. Sec. to visit site near S. China Sea
item.description: Secretary of Defense Ash Carter will visit the Philippines and stop by two of the five sites where the U.S. will station some forces, including one bordering the disputed South China Sea, a senior defense official told reporters Saturday.

item.title: Real wins to cut gap with Barca
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo and Real Madrid bounced back from Champions League defeat against Wolfsburg to hammer Eibar 4-0 at the Santiago Bernabeu Saturday.

item.title: Rescued... thanks to palm frond SOS
Mom hears dead son's heart 3 years on
item.description: Lisa Swanson heard her late son Levi Schulz's heart beating in an organ transplant recipient for the first time since his tragic death.

item.title: Rule the World wins Grand National
item.description: The 33--1 shot Rule the World won the 2016 Grand National at the Aintree Racecourse in Liverpool, England.

item.title: Mohamed Abrini ID'd as third suspect at Brussels Airport
FBI arrests most-wanted woman
ISIS used families as human shields
The world's most dangerous dam
Mogadishu blast kills 3, injures 5
item.description: At least three people were killed and five others were wounded Saturday when a car bomb detonated near a restaurant in Mogaishu, the Somali capital, according to the Somali National News Agency.

item.title: A Muslim country that loves America
item.description: American foreign policy has found in Albania a merger of idealism and action, writes Frida Ghitis.

item.title: The $900M village with no cars
Is this the world's most beautiful sports venue?
